title: I got hacked plus help
body: I got hacked by someone and I sent a ticket to riot they did not answer for the past 1 hour

replies.body: Account Recoveries are a long process! Make sure to stick with your ticket and a specialist will investigate the account and look to help you get it back as soon as possible.

My friend just had the same thing on EU West. He is new and all of a sudden he can't log in or reset his password. 

I checked his Match History and someone was playing at the same time (it's easy to spot the difference between 0-20 and 12-11 game straight after).

Anyone else having this problem?
Cantlow back in to my account not even on the site the hacker has changed the password and username pls help me guys
